page.title: 14A day in the life of J.Gow
page.content: I wake up at about 7.30am, get dressed, and I'm down in the kitchen at about 7.55, when I feed the cats. I usually only have a glass of milk for breakfast, and then I leave for{school at about 8.30am for lessons that start at 8.55. We normally start with maths or English, or we finish the work from the day before. Each day we have an assembly when the whole school meets together. We have a short break in the morning and the afternoon. I don't like school dinners and so I have sandwiches. After lunch we do Topic work, which I prefer, and school finishes at 3.30pm. When I get home I have a cup of tea and watch T.V. or play on my BBC computer. On Tuesday's I go to scouts from 8pm-9.50pm. I get to bed, normally, at about 9.30pm.
